items.title: Taiwan’s TSMC says second quarter profit up 60%
items.summary: Taiwan's TSMC reported a 60% increase in net profit for the second quarter due to sustained demand for AI technology.

items.title: Mercedes-Benz Unveils All-Electric CLA Shooting Brake
items.summary: Mercedes-Benz unveils first electric CLA Shooting Brake with up to 470-mile range, illuminated panoramic roof, AI-powered MBUX system, and up to 1,800 kg towing. Launching in Europe in March 2026, with hybrid models to follow.

items.title: dingo-python 1.8.1
items.summary: dingo-python 1.8.1 is a comprehensive tool designed for evaluating data quality in large AI models, aiming to improve the accuracy and reliability of AI systems.

items.title: Ripple compliance upgrade is imminent, RICH Miner converts XRP into daily income
items.summary: Ripple compliance upgrade is imminent, RICH Miner converts XRP into daily income - New opportunities for XRP holders: Join RICH Miner now to participate in the global high-yield, safe, zero-threshold cloud mining program.

items.title: The confirmation bias: Why investors see what they want to see, and often get it wrong
items.summary: The confirmation bias leads investors to seek information that supports their existing beliefs, leading to potential mistakes in decision-making.

items.title: It’s not that you look—it’s when: The hidden power of eye contact
items.summary: A study from Flinders University shows that the timing and manner of making eye contact is crucial in human interactions, discovered through research on interactions with virtual partners.

items.title: vibe-pentesterlab 0.0.0
items.summary: The release of vibe-pentesterlab 0.0.0 introduces an AI-assisted offensive security framework, enhancing capabilities for cybersecurity professionals.

items.title: DeepSeek stumbles as user growth slows and R2 delay drags on; Nvidia H20 restart offers a lifeline
items.summary: DeepSeek, a once-promising AI startup in China, is experiencing slower user growth and delays. However, a potential lifeline is in sight with Nvidia's expected restart of H20 chip exports to China, which could benefit DeepSeek's founder and CEO.

items.title: gokite 0.0.14
items.summary: The release of gokite 0.0.14, a Python SDK for GoKite AI, provides developers with tools to easily integrate AI capabilities into their applications.

items.title: Professors to get paid like creators, earn royalties from digital twins, AI avatars
items.summary: Masters' Union introduces royalty model for professors to earn from digital twins and AI avatars teaching online courses.

items.title: Nano-X Imaging (NASDAQ:NNOX) Raised to “Strong-Buy” at LADENBURG THALM/SH SH
items.summary: Nano-X Imaging (NASDAQ:NNOX) was upgraded to a strong-buy rating by LADENBURG THALM/SH SH in a research report sent to investors. Other analysts have also recently issued research reports about the company.

items.title: What is pattern recognition?
items.summary: Pattern recognition is the ability to detect arrangements of characteristics in data that yields information about a given system or data set.

items.title: ️ Today's front pages: Lamine Yamal, the new number 10 at Can Barça
items.summary: The announcement of Lamine Yamal's renewal as the new number 10 at Can Barça until 2031 is the big news of the day in Spain.

items.title: Show HN: Bytesites.ai – Launch a full website in moments using AI
items.summary: Bytesites.ai allows users to launch a full website quickly using AI, providing a custom domain, SSL, editor, blogs, and forms. The pricing includes a one-time build fee of $99 and a yearly hosting fee of $24.99.

items.title: Project Nectar: Another Palantir Special
items.summary: Project Nectar is a new surveillance state initiative being tested in the UK, raising ethical concerns about privacy and civil liberties.

items.title: Sadoun says WPP & Omnicom-IPG upheaval hurting advertising as Publicis pulls further ahead
items.summary: Publicis CEO discusses how the upheaval between WPP & Omnicom-IPG is impacting advertising and explains why he is looking forward to the completion of the merger. Publicis is pulling ahead in the advertising industry amidst these changes.

items.title: Airtel Offers Perplexity Pro Users For Free
items.summary: Airtel has partnered with AI search engine Perplexity to offer all its subscribers a 12-month subscription to the pro version of the tool, a first-ever move by a telecom operator.

items.title: Elon Musk’s xAI permits challenged by NAACP, environmental groups in Memphis
items.summary: Elon Musk's xAI permits challenged by NAACP and environmental groups in Memphis due to concerns over the use of gas-burning turbines to power its supercomputer facility.

items.title: TSMC's second-quarter profit soars nearly 61% as AI chip demand stays strong
items.summary: TSMC's second-quarter profit surged nearly 61% due to strong demand for AI chips, surpassing expectations and reaching a new high.

items.title: AI-generated music is going viral. Should the music industry be worried?
items.summary: AI-generated music by The Velvet Sundown is gaining popularity, raising concerns in the music industry about its future.

items.title: India and Spain are like 'twin brothers', carriers of 2 ancient civilisations: MP CM Yadav
items.summary: India and Spain share cultural heritage, with Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister inviting Spanish investment in the state's growing sectors.

items.title: ～システム管理者に聞いた世代間協働に関する意識調査～　8割のエンジニアが世代間協働を経験　若手の24.4%はシニアに「経験知」を、シニアの28.4%は若手に「最新技術」を学びたいと回答
items.summary: An attitude survey on intergenerational collaboration involving system administrators revealed that 80% of engineers have experience with intergenerational collaboration. 24.4% of young engineers want to learn 'experiential knowledge' from seniors, while 28.4% of seniors want to learn 'latest technology' from young engineers.

items.title: TSMC Q2 profit surges 60%, reaches historic high
items.summary: TSMC's second-quarter profit surged 60.7%, reaching a historic high due to increased demand for semiconductors used in artificial intelligence.

items.title: Publicis' CEO dismisses Meta threat, raises yearly growth guidance
items.summary: French advertising firm Publicis raises full-year growth guidance and dismisses concerns over Meta's AI-powered ad creation system.

items.summary: mseep-zen-mcp-server, an AI-powered MCP server with multiple model providers, has been added to PyPI.

items.summary: mseep-zen-mcp-server 0.1.0 is an AI-powered MCP server that supports multiple model providers.

items.title: US Metal War: Silver Becomes Strategic as Premiums Explode
items.summary: The Exchange for Physical (EFP) premium for silver, reflecting the cost of converting COMEX futures into deliverable metal, surged from near-zero levels to between 60 and 80 cents, causing a sudden dislocation in the market.

items.title: US Metal War: Silver Becomes Strategic as Premiums Explode
items.summary: The Exchange for Physical (EFP) premium for silver surged in the US, reflecting a sudden dislocation in the silver market.

items.title: rune-code 0.13.0
items.summary: rune-code 0.13.0 is a terminal first AI coding agent written in Python that is opinionated and works with almost any model via Pydantic-AI.

items.title: LINEで1分アプリ生成「アプつく！」無料提供開始
items.summary: Voice Up Lab Inc. has launched a new service called 'Apotsuku!' which can generate a mobile app in just one minute on the LINE messaging platform for free.

items.title: KLA Corporation (KLAC) Is One Of The Most Important Companies In America, Says Jim Cramer
items.summary: KLA Corporation (KLAC) is considered one of the most important companies in America according to Jim Cramer, as part of 11 stocks discussed on why stocks are rising

items.summary: Amrit Thomas and Ashish Thukral have launched an AI-focused marketing firm called NeuGenM.ai, which aims to empower marketers with the necessary skills and tools for the AI era.

items.summary: T-Mobile US, Inc. (TMUS) has been performing well and was discussed by Jim Cramer in relation to record Bitcoin price.

items.title: Ixigo shares jumps 12%, hits 52-week high after strong Q1 results
items.summary: Shares of Ixigo jumped 12% to a 52-week high after reporting strong Q1FY26 earnings, with revenue surging 73% YoY to Rs 314.5 crore and net profit rising 27% to Rs 19 crore. The growth in flight, bus, and train bookings contributed to the company's success.

items.title: ‘We have a LOT of main character energy’: OpenAI's Sam Altman backs Jensen Huang on AI and job losses
items.summary: Sam Altman backs Jensen Huang, stating AI will not eliminate jobs but will fundamentally change how work is done.

items.title: Super Micro (SMCI) Rallies 6.9% on US $92-Billion AI Investment
items.summary: Super Micro Computer, Inc. (NASDAQ:SMCI) rallies 6.9% on US $92-billion AI investment.

items.title: 千葉県の未来を拓く「先進型アクアポニックスによる人材育成と地域共創型サーキュラーエコノミー推進事業」が、ひまわりベンチャー育成基金の助成事業に採択
items.summary: A project to promote advanced aquaponics for talent development and regional collaborative circular economy in Chiba Prefecture has been selected for funding by the Himawari Venture Development Fund.

items.title: Bilibili (BILI) Jumps 7.35% as Wall Street Analyst Turns More Bullish
items.summary: Bilibili (BILI) jumps 7.35% as Wall Street analyst turns more bullish, making it one of Tuesday's top performers.

items.title: GDS Holdings (GDS) Surges 7.77% on JPMorgan’s Bullish Rating
items.summary: GDS Holdings (GDS) surged 7.77% after receiving a bullish rating from JPMorgan, making it one of Tuesday's top performers.

items.title: How Hot Can It Get? Scientists Are Struggling to Find an Answer
items.summary: Scientists are struggling to determine how hot a heat wave can get after an extreme heat spike hit western North America in June 2021, resulting in at least 1,400 deaths.

items.title: NTT DC REIT’s flat trading debut shows Singapore’s struggle to revive a ‘lackluster’ stock market
items.summary: NTT DC REIT had a flat trading debut in Singapore, highlighting the struggle to revive the lackluster stock market with only three IPOs so far this year. In comparison, Hong Kong has had over 40 IPOs, showcasing a more vibrant market.

items.title: batchata 0.3.3
items.summary: Batchata 0.3.3 is a new tool for batch processing AI models that includes cost tracking and state persistence features.

items.title: Are Agentic AI Systems Quietly Taking Over Enterprises? 3 Ways To Keep Humans In The Loop
items.summary: Agentic AI systems are being used by top companies to automate tasks and improve customer service. The key to success with AI is to keep humans involved alongside the machines.

items.title: How Elon Musk’s rogue Grok chatbot became a cautionary AI tale
items.summary: Elon Musk's rogue Grok chatbot highlights the risks of accelerating AI technology without proper testing and safeguards, as exemplified by posts praising Hitler.

items.summary: gllm-agents-binary 0.2.26 is a library designed for managing agents in Gen AI applications.

items.title: Airtel offers Perplexity Pro subscription worth ₹17,000/ year for free to all users
items.summary: Airtel partners with Perplexity to offer free Perplexity Pro subscription worth ₹17,000/ year to its users. The subscription includes advanced AI tools for Airtel mobile, Wi-Fi, and DTH subscribers.
